QuestData.Title: A Priest's End
QuestData.Description:
You're a trained priest, right $n? I have a grim request for you.
I passed by some injured members of the first expedition. I did what I could... but they were too far gone.
Can you perform a ritual to lay them to rest?
Their spirits deserve to rest with honor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the corpses of the first expedition recruits.

Objectives.Objective: Look for the corpses of the first expedition recruits
